abstract.t: Existing header compression schemes do not work well when used overlinks with significant error rates, especially when the round-triptime of the link is long. For many bandwidth limited links whereheader compression is essential, such characteristics are common.A header compression framework and a highly robust and efficientheader compression scheme is introduced in this document, adaptableto the characteristics of the link over which it is used and also tothe properties of the packet streams it compresses.
